Experiences

May 2021 - Now

Divar is the largest and leading horizontal classifieds in Iran with more than 40 million users and 500+ thousand daily ads.

- Developing features using the latest software engineering practices and methods, focusing on clean, highly available, scale-able, and reusable components for large-scale enterprise applications.
- Developing and maintaining Divar's UI Component library based on React.JS with storybook, reducing development costs and lowering time to market for new features and verticals while keeping the quality high.
- Actively participating in overall developer experience sessions to find and tackle problems regarding slow development.
- Maintaining overall code quality and faster design to release process by code reviews.
- Revising technical decisions and protocols to implement a more robust system.
- Designed and developed a solution for faster, automated, and more reliable UI Kit release to dependency update in the main project resulting in tackling UI kit dependency pending for good in almost any case.
- Monitoring overall service stats as an on-call senior and system owner.

Skills: JavaScript · TypeScript · React.js · docker · Kubernetes · Node.js · Redux.js · Git · SSR · Webpack · Cascading Style Sheets (CSS)
